title: WTB: T206 Mordecai Brown w/SC 150 factory 25 & T206 Shaughnessy
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Mordecai Brown w/SC 150 factory 25 & T206 Shaughnessy
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
As the title states: 

1) Looking for a T206 M. Brown (any variation) with a Sweet Caporal 150 Subjects, factory 25 back.

SGC 30-40 or PSA 2-3 or BVG 2.5-3.5

2) T206 Shag Shaughnessy in any low to mid grade condition with any of the 3 backs as long as it is graded.

I can pay by check or Paypal.

Thanks for your time.

just some info for you eric-alot of browns portraits have the sc 150/25. 

for some reason the brown portrait and the chase pink have this back. 
i would say kinda common.

Thanks for that info.  So far the only ones I've come across are Piedmont 150's and SC 350's.

I'd actually rather have the portrait in an SC 150 factory 25, and since it is kind of common, I'm hoping someone has one for me!
